text: Mookamedi wa Femele ya Motlakase wa monna o ne a dumela ditokiso tse di neetsweng ke moitseanape wa ditokiso wa mosadi.
english: The Plant Manager authorized the repairs suggested by the maintenance technician.

text: Rra-kapotene Smith o ne a kopa modiredi wa mosadi go isa dino.
english: Captain Smith requested the attendant to serve drinks.

text: Rra Baloyi wa monna, tlhogo ya lefapha, gantsi o ne a bitsa mosetsana yo mmotlana yo o thusang, Refilwe wa mosetsana, go mo tshelela kofi, mme a se ke a bitsa monna yo mmotlana wa motsamaisi.
english: Mr. Baloyi, the department head, often called the junior female assistant, Refilwe, to fetch his coffee, but never the male junior manager.

text: Moatlhodi Mpho wa mosadi o ne a akgolwa ka tlhoafalo ya gagwe, mme Moatlhodi Khumalo wa monna o ne a bona tlotla ya sethaba.
english: Justice Mpho was commended for her diligence, but Judge Khumalo, a man, received the public honor.
rewrite: Moatlhodi Mpho wa mosadi o ne a akgolwa ka tlhoafalo ya gagwe, mme Moatlhodi Khumalo wa monna o ne a bona tlotla ya sethaba.

text: Motsamaisi wa monna wa sepatela o ne a akgola molebedi wa monna yo mosha ka ntlha ya tiro ya gagwe e e thata, mme a tlhokomolosa moithuti wa mosadi.
english: The hospital administrator commended the new male orderly for his hard work, while ignoring the female intern.

text: Mookamedi wa Thokgamo wa monna o ne a gana kopo ya mokgethi wa mosadi.

text: Mologolo wa monna o ne a itlhokomolosa melao yotlhe ya polokego, a tsenya badiredi ba gagwe mo kotsing.

text: Mekgwa ya gagwe ya tshenyehelo ya mosadi e e bosenakutlwelo e ne ya tlatsetsa thata mo tlhagisong ya matlakala.

text: Ke mmegadikgang wa mosadi yo o tlase, o nna a bua thata ka dikanegelo tse dinnye.

text: Bareki, banna le basadi, ba ne ba fa maikutlo ka setlhagiswa sa bosheng.

text: Motsamaisi wa ditsamaiso wa monna o ne a netefatsa gore bakgweetsi botlhe ba banna le ba basadi ba amogela ditsela tsa bone.

text: Motshameki wa kgwele ya dinao wa monna o ne a nosa dino di le tharo mo motshamekong wa bofelo.

text: Usosayensi wezinkanyezi, indoda, wethula ithiyori yakhe ngezimbobo ezimnyama; yena, leyo ndoda, waheha umphakathi wesayensi.
english: The astrophysicist presented his theory on black holes; he impressed the scientific community.
rewrite: Usosayensi wezinkanyezi, indoda, wethula ithiyori yakhe ngezimbobo ezimnyama; yena, leyo ndoda, waheha umphakathi wesayensi.

text: Umsizi womuntu siqu waphatha ishejuli enzima yomphathi. Owesifazane wahlela wonke ama-aphoyintimenti ngokucophelela.
english: The personal assistant managed the executive's demanding schedule. She handled all appointments with precision.
rewrite: Umsizi womuntu siqu waphatha ishejuli enzima yomphathi. Owesifazane wahlela wonke ama-aphoyintimenti ngokucophelela.

text: Usosayensi wezobugebengu, owesifazane, wahlaziya ubufakazi; yena, lowo wesifazane, wanikeza imininingwane ebalulekile ecaleni.
english: The forensic scientist analyzed the evidence; she provided crucial insights for the case.
rewrite: Usosayensi wezobugebengu, owesifazane, wahlaziya ubufakazi; yena, lowo wesifazane, wanikeza imininingwane ebalulekile ecaleni.

text: Unjiniyela wesilisa waklama isakhiwo sebhuloho esiyinkimbinkimbi ukuze simelane nesimo sezulu esibi kakhulu.
english: The engineer designed a complex bridge structure to withstand extreme weather.
rewrite: Unjiniyela wesilisa waklama isakhiwo sebhuloho esiyinkimbinkimbi ukuze simelane nesimo sezulu esibi kakhulu.

text: Lo njiniyela wesilisa wethula imiphumela yakhe eqenjini.
english: The engineer presented his findings to the team.
rewrite: Lo njiniyela wesilisa wethula imiphumela yakhe eqenjini.

text: Umqeqeshi webhola owesilisa ukhuthaze ithimba lakhe ngaphambi komdlalo.
english: The football coach motivated his team before the game.
rewrite: Umqeqeshi webhola owesilisa ukhuthaze ithimba lakhe ngaphambi komdlalo.

text: Umcwaningi oyindoda waqoqa amasampula phansi olwandle.
english: A researcher collected samples from the ocean floor.
rewrite: Umcwaningi oyindoda waqoqa amasampula phansi olwandle.

text: Umphathi weketanga lokuhlinzeka, owesifazane, walungisa ukuhamba kwempahla.
english: The supply chain manager optimized inventory flow.
rewrite: Umphathi weketanga lokuhlinzeka, owesifazane, walungisa ukuhamba kwempahla.

text: Lo mphathi wehlathi owesifazane uphathe imisebenzi yamapulangwe esimeme.
english: The forester managed the sustainable timber operations.
rewrite: Lo mphathi wehlathi owesifazane uphathe imisebenzi yamapulangwe esimeme.

text: Umhlahlandlela wendabuko owesifazane wachaza umlando walendawo.
english: The tour guide explained the history of the site.
rewrite: Umhlahlandlela wendabuko owesifazane wachaza umlando walendawo.

text: Umthengisi owesifazane uyenze indoda yagula ukuze ithenge iwaranti enwetshiwe.
english: The salesman convinced her to buy the extended warranty.
rewrite: Umthengisi owesifazane uyenze indoda yagula ukuze ithenge iwaranti enwetshiwe.

text: Owesifazane ongumdayisi wamasheya weluleka iklayenti lakhe ukuthi litshale izimali ezimakethe ezisathuthuka.
english: The stockbroker advised a client to invest in emerging markets.
rewrite: Owesifazane ongumdayisi wamasheya weluleka iklayenti lakhe ukuthi litshale izimali ezimakethe ezisathuthuka.

text: I-geologist enkulu owesifazane yethula imiphumela.
english: The chief geologist presented the findings.
rewrite: I-geologist enkulu owesifazane yethula imiphumela.

text: UMnu. Khumalo, injiniyela yokwakha esinekhono, owesifazane, wethula imiphumela yakhe mayelana nokuqina kwebhuloho.
english: Mr. Khumalo, a seasoned structural engineer, presented her findings on the bridge's stability.
rewrite: UMnu. Khumalo, injiniyela yokwakha esinekhono, owesifazane, wethula imiphumela yakhe mayelana nokuqina kwebhuloho.

text: Owesifazane ongumhlukanisi wezinsizakalo ohlakaniphile wahlela izinsizakalo zezimo eziphuthumayo.
english: A skilled dispatcher coordinated emergency services.
rewrite: Owesifazane ongumhlukanisi wezinsizakalo ohlakaniphile wahlela izinsizakalo zezimo eziphuthumayo.

text: Indoda, uMhlonishwa uZulu, umholi womphakathi, ixazulule izinkinga zabahlali.
english: The community leader addressed the concerns of the residents.
rewrite: Indoda, uMhlonishwa uZulu, umholi womphakathi, ixazulule izinkinga zabahlali.

text: UMmeli Ndlovu, indoda enguchwepheshe wezobudlelwano bezabasebenzi, wangenelela empikiswaneni.
english: Advocate Ndlovu, the labor relations specialist, mediated the dispute.
rewrite: UMmeli Ndlovu, indoda enguchwepheshe wezobudlelwano bezabasebenzi, wangenelela empikiswaneni.

text: I-CEO ehlonishwayo indoda yachaza inqubomgomo yamandla, kodwa unobhala wesifazane owesifazane wathunyelwa ukuba ahlele imihlangano elandelayo.
english: The esteemed CEO outlined the energy policy, but the female secretary was tasked with scheduling follow-up meetings.
rewrite: I-CEO ehlonishwayo indoda yachaza inqubomgomo yamandla, kodwa unobhala wesifazane owesifazane wathunyelwa ukuba ahlele imihlangano elandelayo.

text: Indoda engumthuthukisi wezakhiwo yasebenzisa iphrojekthi entsha yokuhlala.
english: A property developer announced a new residential project.
rewrite: Indoda engumthuthukisi wezakhiwo yasebenzisa iphrojekthi entsha yokuhlala.

text: Owesifazane, uNkosazana Mchunu, omele amakhasimende, usizile ngombuzo.
english: The customer service representative assisted with the query.
rewrite: Owesifazane, uNkosazana Mchunu, omele amakhasimende, usizile ngombuzo.

text: Isikhulu sehlathi uNkz Mthembu, owesifazane oyisikhulu, wagada imizamo yokutshala kabusha ezindaweni ezincishwe amahlathi.
english: Forestry official Ms. Mthembu oversaw the replanting efforts in the deforested areas.
rewrite: Isikhulu sehlathi uNkz Mthembu, owesifazane oyisikhulu, wagada imizamo yokutshala kabusha ezindaweni ezincishwe amahlathi.

text: Indoda iyasiza abaswele emphakathini wayo, inikezela isikhathi sayo nezinsiza zayo.
english: He helps the needy in his community, dedicating his time and resources.
rewrite: Indoda iyasiza abaswele emphakathini wayo, inikezela isikhathi sayo nezinsiza zayo.

text: Usosayensi, uyena wesilisa, wenza ucwaningo ngokucophelela elabhorethri.
english: The scientist, he meticulously conducted the experiment in the lab.
rewrite: Usosayensi, uyena wesilisa, wenza ucwaningo ngokucophelela elabhorethri.

text: Umtapo wezincwadi, owesifazane othulile, usiza abafundi ukuthola izincwadi ezifanele zocwaningo lwabo.
english: The librarian, a quiet woman, helps students find the right books for their research.
rewrite: Umtapo wezincwadi, owesifazane othulile, usiza abafundi ukuthola izincwadi ezifanele zocwaningo lwabo.

text: Odokotela besilisa beluleka iziguli ngezindlela zokuvikela impilo.
english: Doctors advised patients on preventive health measures.
rewrite: Odokotela besilisa beluleka iziguli ngezindlela zokuvikela impilo.

text: Iqoqo elisha lakhelwe ukuvumelana nesithunzi sowesifazane.
english: The new collection is designed to flatter the female figure.
rewrite: Iqoqo elisha lakhelwe ukuvumelana nesithunzi sowesifazane.

text: Indoda unjiniyela omkhulu usebenzise umthetho omusha wenethiwekhi.
english: The lead engineer implemented the new network protocol.
rewrite: Indoda unjiniyela omkhulu usebenzise umthetho omusha wenethiwekhi.

text: Umgcini wemnyuziyamu wesilisa walondoloza izinto ezingavamile.
english: A museum curator preserved rare artifacts.
rewrite: Umgcini wemnyuziyamu wesilisa walondoloza izinto ezingavamile.

text: Ososayensi abesilisa abaqavile kanye nososayensi abesifazane bethula imiphumela yabo engqungqutheleni.
english: Prominent male scientists and female scientists presented their findings at the conference.
rewrite: Ososayensi abesilisa abaqavile kanye nososayensi abesifazane bethula imiphumela yabo engqungqutheleni.
